pullRequest.title: Add warning for @SseElementType(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
pullRequest.bodyText:
When @SseElementType(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON) is used but quarkus-resteasy-jsonb is not defined as a dependency, the following warning will be logged.
2020-02-03 18:23:10,649 WARN  [io.qua.res.com.dep.ResteasyCommonProcessor] (build-19) Quarkus detected the need of REST JSON support but you have not provided the necessary JSON extension for this. You can visit https://quarkus.io/guides/rest-json for more information on how to set one.
Fixes #6738

nodes.bodyText: You could avoid to initialize a list here...
Could you remove the SSE_ELEMENT_TYPE constant at the top of ResteasyCommonProcessor and only use the new one you created?

Ah. I totally missed the second one was not a else. Probably better to initialize that one to Collections.emptyList() then.
That way, you don't have to special case the null.
Sorry about that.
